name: Disaster Gauntlet
description:
You are the main protagonist. After falling into a comma due to being knocked down by a car, you have just woken up into a dark world. You will have to fight against your torturous mind, and the obstacles to surpass in order to do it possible.

It was made following the UAGames 2021 competition featuring Daniel Pariente, CEO of Hydra Interactive.

A game by Randomy Games, developed with our own graphic engine.

*Warning: Right now Windows version has no sound.
